item.title: Reimagining Government Wellness: Why Yoga Belongs in Every Office
item.description: In an age of AI automation and budget surpluses, government agencies have a profound opportunity to invest in the mental and physical well-being of their employees. This article argues for reallocating funds toward yoga and fitness programs to reduce stress, increase productivity, and foster a new era of human-centered governance.
item.author: eric@quantumcybersolutions.com (Gov Con)
